mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goodsinfo (goods_id, goods_type_id, goods_name, goods_describe, my_team_id, goods_attr) VALUES (#{goodsId},#{goodsTypeId},#{goodsName}, #{goodsDescribe}, #{myTeamId},#{goodsAttr})
INSERT INTO image_space (image_id, my_team_id, image_path) VALUES (#{imageId},#{myTeamId},#{imagePath})
INSERT INTO goods_image(goods_id, image_id, goods_img_type, sort) VALUES (#{goodsId},#{imageId},#{goodsImgType},#{sort})

INSERT INTO goods_standard(standard_id, goods_id, standard_name, standard_price,standard_weight, standard_count) VALUES (#{standardId},#{goodsId},#{standardName},#{standardPrice},#{standardWeight},#{standardCount})
mapper.select: SELECT gi.goods_id,gi.goods_name,gi.goods_create_date, gt.goods_type_name, gs.standard_name,gs.standard_price,gs.standard_count FROM goodsinfo gi INNER JOIN goods_typeinfo gt ON gt.goods_type_id = gi.goods_type_id INNER JOIN goods_standard gs ON gs.goods_id = gi.goods_id WHERE gi.my_team_id = #{myTeamId}

SELECT gi.goods_id, gi.goods_type_id, gi.goods_name, gi.goods_attr, gi.goods_describe, gi.goods_standard, gs.standard_id,gs.standard_name,gs.standard_price, gs.standard_count,gs.standard_weight, img.image_path FROM goodsinfo gi LEFT JOIN goods_standard gs ON gs.goods_id = gi.goods_id LEFT JOIN goods_image gimg ON gimg.goods_id = gi.goods_id LEFT JOIN image_space img ON img.image_id = gimg.image_id WHERE gi.goods_id = #{goodsId} ORDER BY gimg.sort
